game.name: Stacking Up: A World in Progress
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Stacking Up: A World in Progress is a casual physics based puzzle game where you need to stack items to form a chain that stands without falling for 3 seconds. Each stage has different hazards and obstacles that you need to work around or use to your advantage.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Stacking Up: A World in Progress is a casual physics based puzzle game where you need to stack items to form a chain that stands without falling for 3 seconds. Each stage has different hazards and obstacles that you need to work around or use to your advantage.
